C-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Width -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:WallThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:Girth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcCShapeProfileDef:InternalFilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
